summary: An ordinance relating to, regulating and licensing certain occupations, businesses, vocations, trades, amusements and places of amusement; amending Ordinance No. 48022 (The License Code) by adding thereto thirteen new sections relating to, regulating and licensing the sale, use and operation of certain machine amusement devices; prescribing penalties; and repealing Ordinance No. 66368 and 69650.
